content: * repeat from * to end of row 44 stitches remain row 4 knit all stitches row 5 * k2 k2 decrease * repeat from * to end of row 33 stitches remain row 6 knit all stitches row 7 * k1 k2 decrease * repeat from * to end of row 22 stitches remain row 8 knit all stitches row 9 * k2 decrease * repeat from * to end of row 11 stitches remain row 10 knit all stitches cut off yarn leaving an 18 or longer tail with darning needle run the tail through remaining stitches twice push the tail to inside of hat i like to tie off in a knot run tail into stitches trim remaining yarn spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 2 of 7 photos of spiral lace pattern row 1 1 put yarn and in front and slip one stitch purlwise 2 yarn over to back of needle spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 3 of 7 3 knit two together spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 4 of 7 row 2 1 knit slip_stitch from row 1 2 knit yarn over from previous row then k1 spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 5 of 7 photos of hat in progress 1 the hat after completing the brim and the ribbing right side out 2 the hat after it has been rolled to wrong side out the photo shows the wrong side of the spiral lace and the k1 p1 ribbing the knitting is now ready to start the hat and crown spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 6 of 7 3 the completed hat before the brim is rolled up 4 the hat after the brim has been rolled up spiral lace hat by margaretgi page 7 of 7
